name: @streamr-contracts/network-subgraphs
description: Subgraph definitions for the streamr contracts

scripts.build: ./copyAbisFromContractsPackage.sh && npm run codegen && npm run graphbuild
scripts.docker:buildAndPushMultiArch: npm run build && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 . -t streamr/deploy-network-subgraphs:dev-fastchain --push
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy streamr-dev/network-subgraphs --version-label v0.0.1 --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://localhost:8020
scripts.redeploy-local: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run create-local && npm run deploy-local
scripts.deploy-production: graph deploy streamr-dev/network-subgraphs subgraph_prod.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
